import React from "react"; import FormattedDate from "./FormattedDate"; import WeatherTemperature from "./WeatherTemperature"; import Weather from "./Weather"; export default function WeatherInfo(props){ return (

{props.data.city}

  • {props.data.description}
  • Humidity:{props.data.humidity}%
  • Wind: {props.data.humidity}
) }
